name: MSD Google Review
author: MSD

sections.description:
The quality and quantity of reviews on Google is one of the most important ranking factors for local SEO. And, when a person scans the search results for a local product or service in Google, the business listings that include customer reviews present greater credibility and, naturally, receive more clicks.
It’s important for businesses to get Google reviews. Display Google Review on your wordpress page, post, or widget.

Features

  • Simple Settings Page
  • Clear Documentation
  • Minimal Settings
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “msd google review”
  3. Activate msd google review from your Plugins page
  4. Click on the new menu item “Google Review Settings” under settings menu item
